titleStmt.title: Real comforts, extracted from moral and spiritual principles. Presented in a sermon, preached at the funeral of that reverend divine Mr. Thomas Ball late minister of Gods Word at Northampton, upon the 21. day of June, A.D. 1659. With a narrative of his life and death. By John Howes, M.A. rector of Abington near Northampton.
titleStmt.author: Howes, John, 1613-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S. Griffin for R. Royston, and are to sold [sic] at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "June 30 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
